title: WTB Any and All T206 HOF Portraits
author: poorlydrawncat

posts.post_title: WTB Any and All T206 HOF Portraits
posts.post_content:
Starting a T206 HOF Portrait collection from scratch.  Looking for ANY HOF portraits, graded or ungraded, in lower condition (think PSA 1-2, paper loss, marks, and creases welcomed).  From Cobb to Crawford, Bender to Baker.  Probably can't afford some of the bigger names, but you never know. 

I also have some T205 HOFers and some other misc. cards to trade if anyone's interested. 

Email scans and prices to [url]poorlydrawncat@gmail.com[/url].  Thanks!
What t205 hall of famers do you have?
